metadata.longDescription: I2CE is a PHP framework used in the iHRIS Suite. It provides storage abstraction, Javascript handlers, and more.
metadata.creator: Intrahealth Informatics

configurationGroup.name: I2CE
configurationGroup.description: Configuration options for the core engine

configuration.name: stale_time
configuration.description: The time in seconds until a file found in the file search utility is considered stale. If stale, it will search for the file, if not stale, it will use the previously found location of the file (it will cache the file location). If negative, then we do not cache the file location.

configurationGroup.name: times
configurationGroup.description: Various times that affect the configuration

configuration.name: stale
configuration.description: The time in seconds we wait until we check that the configuration files for the system and the modules are up to date. Defaults to 10. If negative, we check the system files on each page request

configuration.name: update_timeout
configuration.description: The time in minutes we wait until we consider an update to have failed and reset the status to done up to date. Defaults to 10. If negative, we dont have a time out
